title: Martin Luther King Jr National Historic Site: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       What better place to learn about Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. than at the historic site dedicated to him. Visit the home where he was born and lived the first twelve years of his life, his spiritual home, and his final resting place. Learn how the Parks As Classroom program at Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historic Site can aid you in teaching your students about Dr. King and the Civil Rights Movement.
